content: tamarugo is cozy hat with textured stitch pattern stitch pattern is created with slipped stitches it is fairly easy but you need to be careful not to tighten the strand in front of the slipped stitches too much **size** tamarugo is designed to fit head circumference 54 -57 cm **there s a little mistake in the pattern it says * head circumstance * although it should say * head circumference *** **materials** 2 x 50 g skeins of rowan hemp tweed in color 133 denim **needles** 4 mm us 6 dpns or circular needle 5 mm us 8 dpns or circular needle **gauge** 24 sts and 28 row = 10 cm in k1 p1 ribbing *if you have any questions or you find an error from the pattern please feel free to leave a comment * **now you can also join knits by saskia group where you can discuss and ask questions about the pattern welcome ** http //www ravelry com/groups/knits-by-saskia
